description: metal bank in the form of a seated black woman holding a child on her lap; when lever on PR side bottom is pushed, woman nods head and moves her spoon and child moves feet; woman wearing green dress, white apron and yellow and red scarves at head and neck; child in yellow dress and white bonnet
marks:
Inscription; Lender\'s Sticker

on bottom of back
title: "Mammy and Child" mechanical bank
